record.dc:title: 5PK1 Ocoee Site / Henry Crox Farm Site 1PK1, Polk County, Tennessee. Limestone slab covered grave of burial 1PK19. Note postmolds around grave that have been excavated. Sq. 13L2. Direction north.
record.wpa:narrative: First evidence of 1PK19 was limestone slabs 0.6' below surface. These piled neatly to form cover for grave. Beneath slabs, the pit appeared. 1PK19 was flexed with head lying on left parietal. All long bones on left side of the pelvis turned up (evidently assumed this position after burial). No grave goods, but no evidence of looting or disturbance. Four post holes surrounding slab covering.
